items.title: Desert Monoliths Reveal World’s Oldest Architectural Plans
items.abstract: Engravings found in Jordan and Saudi Arabia appeared to match nearby ancient megastructures known as desert kites as seen from above.

items.title: Meet the Roving Veterinarians Caring for Mexico’s Rural Horses
items.abstract: Horses, donkeys and mules can be a lifeline for families living in the countryside, but there haven’t always been vets around to treat them.

items.title: How Elon Musk’s Starship design and timeline has changed over seven years.
items.abstract: It’s no longer the Interplanetary Transit System or the “B.F.R.,” and now it’s made of stainless steel.

items.title: Fred Siegel, Urban Historian and a Former Liberal, Is Dead at 78
items.abstract: His books traced his ideological transformation from a Democratic Socialist in New York to neoconservative partisan for Rudolph Giuliani and Donald Trump.

items.title: How to Clear 500,000 Feral Cats From New York’s Streets
items.abstract: After the pandemic boom in pet adoption gave way to pet abandonment, locals in Brooklyn are trying a controversial approach to population control.
